content.heading: MANAGE YOUR FINANCES OUR ASSITANCE IN DISCOVERY PHASE
content.subheading: We ensure that you are able to manage your finances with the proficiency of our team, you can stay on budget without settling for any less in the discovery phase of your business.

items.title: OUR CLIENT’S EXPERIENCE
items.description: Our clients have said it too, Go InfoTech has proved to be an expert custom Software Development Company in Udaipur driving seamless growth for our clients and showcasing our proficiency in web development.

items.title: TOP CLOUD AND DEVOPS SPECIALISTS
items.description: Through our comprehensive procedure, we make sure that our cloud and DevOps specialists are engaged in your crucial project. We are dedicated to the seamless success of your project.

items.title: PROPRIETARY TECHNOLOGY FOR EFFICIENCY
items.description: We utilize our ‘Smart Outsourcing Automation Paradigm’ to integrate cutting-edge, smart technology for your project’s success. Automating crucial procedures and operations like project management, talent acquisition, and retention for effective performance.

items.title: GUARANTEED PROJECT CONSISTENCY:
items.description: Benefit from the seamless and consistent delivery of excellence for uninterrupted success.

items.title: GLOBAL COVERAGE ACROSS TIME ZONES
items.description: We are available 24/7 at your service as we operate across 4 different time zones, which is why we ensure seamless communication. Our team at Go InfoTech is available at your service anytime.

items.title: WIDE RANGE OF SERVICES
items.description: As a leading Web Development company in Udaipur, we offer custom team augmentation in software development, mobile app development, web application development, software maintenance and support, and more.

gridBlueCard2.heading: Discovery PHASE AT GO infotech solution:

items.title: CLEARLY DEFINED SCOPE OF WORK
items.description: The initial start of your project requires clearly identifying the scope of your business and necessitating defining the key features of MPV, your goals associated with it, and its functionality.

items.title: COST-EFFECTIVE PLANNING
items.description: We ensure that your finances stay intact by conducting comprehensive and cost-effective planning. We believe in managing the increased cost of your projects without sacrificing quality services.

items.title: TIMELY PROJECT DELIVERY
items.description: We are dedicated to empowering your startup by incorporating cutting-edge technology and crafting a tailored solution through functional MPV development while adhering to project deadlines.

items.title: ALIGNED PROJECT OUTCOMES
items.description: We ensure that our solutions are meticulously crafted to suit your unique project requirements. We believe in incorporating additional features, improving the functionality, and enhancing your customer base.

cards.title: USER NEEDS DETERMINATION
cards.description: We identify your target users, their unique requirements, and the challenges posed in the industry, and enhance user experience using our SEO Services in Udaipur

cards.title: DEVELOPING FULL-PRODUCT DESIGN
cards.description: Our team develops interactive prototypes that will generate an elevated user experience. Further, present it to potential users and investors.

cards.title: COMPETITOR ANALYSIS
cards.description: A comprehensive research plan evaluating the strengths and weaknesses of your rivals in the industries and existing opportunities for you to exploit

cards.title: USER STORIES
cards.description: illustrative feedback of the users of the product, providing necessary insights to understand the needs and user preferences.

steps.title: PRODUCT CONCEPT OUTLINE:
steps.description: A brief description that outlines the vision and objectives of your business and your project’s specific requirements.

steps.title: TARGET AUDIENCE, USE CASES
steps.description: Evaluate and recognize who your target audience is, and further evaluate user behavior and preferences.

steps.title: IDENTIFICATION OF MVP FEATURES
steps.description: We make use of integration research while also assessing your MVP’s core functionality, further incorporating additional features.

steps.title: FEATURE BREAKDOWN
steps.description: We make sure that the designs we make use of are effective and functional through thorough testing, conducting surveys, and moving forward with a problem-solving approach.

steps.title: ESTIMATION OF BUDGET AND TIMELINE
steps.description: We draft a template stating a ballpark figure for the project and an estimated timeline within which we shall serve.

steps.title: PROJECT DISCOVERY OUTCOME DOCUMENT
steps.description: We draft a document stating insights from the results of the discovery phase, relevant findings, and necessary feedback and recommendations.

steps.title: RISK ASSESSMENT AND MITIGATION PLAN
steps.description: Identifying the potential threats and meticulously planning and strategizing ways to combat them.

steps.title: RECOMMENDATION ON TECHNOLOGIES
steps.description: Our experts make use of cutting-edge technology and best practices as per your project’s unique requirements and industry trends.

steps.title: WIREFRAME CONCEPT (2-3 SCREENS)
steps.description: A foundational visual guide illustrating the core structure of the product

steps.title: USER WORKFLOW
steps.description: A strategic map displaying the workflow of the users.

iconTopCard2.heading: GET TO KNOW GO INFOTECH’S DISCOVERY TEAM:

items.title: PRODUCT OWNER
items.description: Craft unique business strategies that fulfill your specific project requirements, and ensure that these strategies align with your project’s goals and objectives. Identify your unique business vision and what you expect from the product.

items.title: SOLUTION ARCHITECT
items.description: We conduct comprehensive research to analyze the workings of the industry and craft solutions based on your unique needs.

items.title: PROJECT MANAGER
items.description: We meticulously plan and work closely with our team to ensure that our technical team optimizes the project workflow and its timely execution.

items.title: UI/UX DESIGNER
items.description: Through our user-centric approach, we are successful in reaching the target audience via our visually appealing UI/UX designs that are user-friendly and lead to an exceptional user experience on all platforms.
